name: High Jump
requires: {OptAll(|Triple Jump| or |Back Flip| or |Side Flip| or (|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|))}

name: Pyramid Skip
requires: {OptAll(|Bullet Bill| or ((|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump|) + Cap Vault))}

name: Into the Lake
requires: {OptAll((|Zipper| and |Swim|) or (|Cap Vault| and (|High Jump| OR |Long Jump| OR (|Triple Jump| AND |Wall Jump|))) OR (|Cap Jump| AND |Triple Jump| AND |Wall Jump| AND |Goomba|))}

name: Sherm Wall
requires: {OptAll((|Hold/Throw| or (|High Jump| and |Cap Vault|) or (|Uproot| and |Dive|)) and (|Sherm| or (|Goomba| and |Wall Jump| and |Dive|)))}

name: After Gusty Barrier
requires: {OptAll(|Ty-foo| or (|Dive| or (|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump| or |Cap Jump|)))}

name: Get to Cheese
requires: {OptAll(|Lava Bubble| or (|Dive| and (|Triple Jump| or |Cap Jump| or (|Ground Pound| and |Ground Pound Jump|))))}

name: Get to Meat
requires: {OptAll(|Volbonan| or ((|High Jump| or |Spin|) + (|Wall Jump| + |Dive|)) or (|High Jump| + (|Cap Jump| or (|Cap Jump| + |Dive|))))}

name: Enter the Courtyard
requires: {OptAll(|Pokio| or (|Dive| and (|Back Flip| or |Wall Jump| or (|Ground Pound Jump| + |Ground Pound|))))}

name: Parabones Skip
requires: {OptAll(|Parabones| or (|Cap Vault| and (|Long Jump| or |Triple Jump|)))}

name: Moon Cave Skip
requires: {YamlEnabled(moon_cave_skip)} and {OptAll(|Cap Jump| and |Wall Jump| and (|Back Flip| or (|Ground Pound| + |Ground Pound Jump|)))}
